flowers.instructions: Large double. Good grower, heavy bloomer. Early to mid-season, acid loving plants. Plant in moist well drained soil with pH of 4.0-5.5.
flowers.name: Azalea

flowers.instructions: Quick-growing, herbaceous, shrub reaching up to 30 inches in height, forming a rounded, dense bush.
flowers.name: Plectranthus

flowers.instructions: Deep purple colored flowers bushy rounded growth habit to 3 feet tall. Plant in full sun. Water regularly.
flowers.name: Rosa Burgundy

flowers.instructions: They do not thrive indoors, where the light is too dim, and humidity too low, for them to grow properly.
flowers.name: Bonsai Tree
